name: LD47 - A Hamster's Journey to Nowhere
name_original: LD47 - A Hamster's Journey to Nowhere
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47

A Hamster's Journey to Nowhere is a clicker style game where you build up speed and acceleration by purchasing upgrades to your hamster and hamster wheel with said speed.

Controls

  • Purchase single upgrades with left click or bulk buy with right click
  • Upgrades will unlock as you purchase previous upgrades and as you reach the required cost, you can upgrade acceleration, max speed, and speed per click
  • Click anywhere in the cage area to give your hamster additional speed
  • Toggle sound effects and music with the buttons in the top left
